name: My Newborn Care - Baby Cooking & Dressup
name_original: My Newborn Care - Baby Cooking & Dressup
description:
In this wonderful baby care game for kids and girl,as a babysitter,help the mommy to take care of the cute little Baby!!!
First of all,cooking and prepare her food,then feed her,give her the best meal possible.Then give her a daily bath,wipe her clean with a sponge. after that,dress her up,choose hairstyles, outfits, onesies, dresses and toys!Now she’s ready to sleep.Give all the love and care her with your best.Real fun baby care!
